Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are using a string telephone to talk over a distance.
The student can include a specific feature of the string telephone, showing that it uses sound to communicate.
The student can demonstrate that the device can send or receive information over a distance in their drawing.
The student can illustrate how people can communicate over long distances with this device using simple materials.
The student can show or label the sound traveling through the string, indicating how the information is being communicated.
